Posting an advert for Chinese mobile phone company Huawei on his Twitter page, Griezmann steals the show with a brief cameo in 'Une Historie de Flour'.

As a fan spots him casually walking out of a restaurant in a crisp white shirt in the slightly surreal French advert, he asks the Atletico Madrid superstar for a photo.

Griezmann, readying his trademark 'Hotline Bling' pose, is all ears until he receives a phone call on his smartwatch.

It's José - hardly the most common name in France.
